attributes.action: make sure that Tony Blair should never become President of Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
He is n unconvicted war criminal and responsible for thousands of deaths in Iraq.  Europe needs a responsible President
Someone who cares about the citizens of Europe. Tony Blair does not meet this criteria.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
